jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced Interventional Radiology Registered Nurse for a 13-week travel contract.  The Interventional Radiology RN assists in a variety of invasive procedures from central venous access insertion such as PICC lines to more complicated procedures such as stroke intervention and TIPs insertion. The Interventional Radiology RN is responsible for preparing patients for procedures, monitoring patients during procedures, and cleaning surgical site post-procedure.  1+ year of recent Interventional Radiology experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
